New Records: Nortje named man of the match for his career-best figures of 4-7
Key Match Events: South Africa win by six wickets after a superb bowling performance in the first innings
Opener de Kock scored 20, while captain Markram scored 12 and Stubbs made 13
Klaasen finishes 19 not out and Miller 6 six not out
Theekshana thinks he has trapped Klaasen LBW, and Sri Lanka take a review
Post-Match Reflections: Markram happy with South Africa’s efforts
Hasaranga says it was a ‘130-140 run wicket’
Nortje revels in great result for the Proteas
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa go top of Group D
The win in New York puts South Africa on top of Group D with two points
Others: Sri Lanka vs South Africa in the T20 World Cup has finished, but we have more live coverage of this tournament awaiting you
